name: BombSquad Arm64

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# BombSquad 1.7 Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

cd /mnt/server
apk --update add curl

curl https://files.ballistica.net/bombsquad/builds/BombSquad_Server_Linux_Arm64_1.7.6.tar.gz -o bombsquad.tar.gz

tar -xf bombsquad.tar.gz -C /mnt/server

cp -r ./BombSquad_Server_Linux_Arm64_1.7.6/dist /mnt/server/
cp -r ./BombSquad_Server_Linux_Arm64_1.7.6/bombsquad_server /mnt/server/
cp -r ./BombSquad_Server_Linux_Arm64_1.7.6/config.yaml /mnt/server/
cp ./BombSquad_Server_Linux_Arm64_1.7.6/README.txt /mnt/server/

chmod 777 /mnt/server

rm -rf ./bombsquad.tar.gz
rm -rf ./BombSquad_Server_Linux_Arm64_1.7.6

echo -e "install complete"
exit 0
